tasks.instruction:
Create a comprehensive React/Next.js frontend for the Routix Platform that integrates with all backend services. Build a modern, responsive web application with:
- User authentication and registration system
- Template browsing and upload functionality  
- Real-time thumbnail generation with progress tracking
- Chat/conversation management interface
- User dashboard with credits and analytics
- Admin panel for platform management
- Real-time WebSocket integration for progress updates
- Modern UI using Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui components
- Complete integration with all 50+ backend API endpoints
